  1. org.wikirate4j.entitities

Uses of Package
org.wikirate4j.entitities

Packages that use org.wikirate4j.entitities
Package
Description
org.wikirate4j
 
org.wikirate4j.entitities
 
  • Classes in org.wikirate4j.entitities used by org.wikirate4j
    Class
    Description
    Answer
    The Answer Object represent the answer on a question (Metric) on a specific company on a specific year.
    AnswerItem
    The AnswerItem Object represents an answer on a Metric.
    Card
    Cards are the building blocks of all decko sites.
    CheckedBy
    Users are able to flag an answer to request a check in case they have doubts that the answer is correct.
    Company
    In WikiRate, a Company represents any formal reporting organization, including corporations, NGOs, universities, and similar entities.
    CompanyGroup
    Company Groups are company groupings based on user defined preferences.
    Dataset
    Datasets are helping Users to structure information on WikiRate by combining Companies and Metrics associated with a particular theme or research.
    Metric
    A Wikirate Metric is used to measure company performance.
    Region
    The Region entity extends the notion of a Card to provide additional information and functionality.
    Relationship
    Relation Metrics are a special type of metrics that produce special type of Relationship.
    RelationshipItem
    The RelationshipItem Object represents a relationship answer on a relationship metric type.
    ResearchGroup
    Research Groups are a collection of WikiRate contributors, their Research Projects, and Metrics they created.
    Source
    A Source is generally a company report, including CSR Report, Sustainability Report, Annual Report or Integrated Report.
    Topic
    Topics are used in Wikirate as a way to organize Metrics and other content into thematic groups.
